meanings: (음식이) go bad[sour, rotten], spoil, go[get] stale
(몸이) grow haggard, be emaciated, (건강이) be broken (in health), injure (one's health)
(마음·기분 등이) hurt, get[be] hurt[offended], be distressed[troubled] (with)

vlive.english: Yeah, your hair condition isn't too good. - And then...

vlive.korean: 나 자존심이 상해서 못 하겠어 - 뭐 하고 싶어요 그러면? I can't. It hurts my pride. - What do you want? 듣기 View video Red Velvet : [Full] 레드벨벳과 [사][이]좋은 [코]리스마스🌲🎁 (Red Velvet's PsychoRISTMAS Party)
